text:
I wrote a column once many years ago suggesting people didn’t need handguns (because they do not) and the vitriol and rage from (mostly U.S.) gun lovers was amazing.
What is it with this topic that so enrages people, in Canada, that one can’t even suggest handguns are a problem?
